name: And Snow Goes Again...
description: And snow goes again is a first person view arcade and horror game. After 10 minutes you will die. To save youself user will spin wander around the forest and gather coins and batteries for the flashlight. User can convert every coin into 30000 dollars through the atm machine. From the start of the game you have 80000$. To save yourself you should spin the wheel of fortune which requires 60000$ and 10000$ additionally every time you spin the wheel again. When user spins the wheel of fortune he changes the current timeline and rewinds the time to 10 minutes earlier. You have to find the door in dark dimension  and change time current timeline. Your goal is to get 8 coins and spin the wheel simultaneously. But there are two golden rules, you must have more than 65001$ every round and this value increases by 5000$ every time you alter the current timeline. Continiously, if you find the teddybear after the third round you will get additional 50000$. You should not forget about the time and gathering the coins in the forest. Moreover, sometimes you must think rapidly and critically to pass the game. Good Luck!
